description:
After receiving an urgent call for help from Nene, who is working as a popular idol in Hong Kong, Tagiru and his friends head to Hong Kong. Nene says she`s been having problems for about a week with a stalker in a mask following her around. Worse yet, when the police pursued the masked stalker, he escaped to DigiQuartz, the Digimon world! Tagiru suddenly becomes intent on protecting Nene, but it turns out the masked stalker is a powerful foe who uses Harpymon, a Digimon with extraordinary flying ability, in his schemes!
The strength of Nene`s Digimon, Sparrowmon, is essential to defeat Harpymon. Nene and Sparrowmon immediately join Tagiru and company as they all venture into battle together!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arrival in Hong Kong! Protect the Super Gorgeous Idol!!
Hong Kong Jouriku! Chou Bishounen Idol o Mamore!
香港上陸! 超美少女アイドルを守れ!!
